Welcome to a thriving, buzzing eco-system where productivity happens naturally. With ZAMBEZYTM your new digital workplace springs to life. It accelerates its fruition. Companies prosper as its intelligent design enables collaboration and adoption.

Made Naturally to Work Smarter

ZAMBEZY™ stirs up traditional intranet thinking.

Protracted analysis – no more.
Time to benefit – shrunk.
Adoption worries – quashed\suppressed\eliminated.

Its fast-familiar user experience allows people to focus on what they do. They can work smarter, share with ease and gain access from anywhere on many devices. Good communications abound via its social network, online conversations and immediate access to live information.

It honours access security, utilises enterprise strength technology and enjoys built-in scalability. Your intranet can evolve as your business grows.

ZAMBEZY™ Accelerator

Fast forward to productivity

ZAMBEZY™ gives you the lion’s share of what you need today and the opportunity to quickly attain the rest.

Engages employees

Broadcast relevant news, promote events and applaud achievements. Encourage contribution and collaboration.

Promotes teamwork

Online spaces for your teams allow them to share information, communicate and organise themselves.

Becomes ever more indispensable

Once you’ve used collaboration sites you’ll never return to shared file stores again.

Eliminates adoption worries

ZAMBEZY’s intuitive experience and powerful search enables people to find what they’re looking for – fast.

Makes sense

The no-brainer alternative to the cost, risk and distraction that you’d get constructing your own intranet.

ZAMBEZY™ Markets

ZAM for Government

  • Federal, State and Local Governments' specific document management taxonomy
  • Pre-configured HP RM™ and RecordPoint™ connectors
  • Knowledge capture management
  • Field Photos management

  • Health sector specific document management taxonomy
  • Pre-configured HP RM™ and RecordPoint™ connectors
  • Social Network integration
  • Team sites structure

  • Specific document management taxonomy
  • Pre-installed project management solution
  • Social Network integration
  • Team sites structure

Our story

ZAMBEZY’s own life-story goes to show how a thriving, bustling work environment allowed a rich amount of experience, expertise and talent, to bear fruit.

As a solid Microsoft Gold Partner we created ZAMBEZY™ on a robust platform. We’ve woven innovation and quality to nurture a digital workplace that your team will love to use.

We get a real buzz from those ‘aha!’ moments as people realise how ZAMBEZY™ unfetters them and allows their combined talents to blossom.

Share Point

Maximise your Microsoft Productivity Suite investment.

ZAMBEZY™ is firmly rooted on Microsoft’s SharePoint technology, a powerful enterprise platform that’s naturally adept for knowledge sharing

By adopting our world-class intranet accelerator, built and supported by our accomplished experts, you can harness its powerful capability within a stylish single digital experience. It stimulates employee engagement and promotes productivity.
